recipesJson.name: Custard Cupcake [Flavor Book Entry Recipe]
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A fluffy cupcake drenched in condensed milk
Recipe created for the (FW) Tres Leches FlavorBook Entry
-> http://diyordievaping.com/2017/06/15/fw-tres-leches/

reviews.text: This is one of my favourite custard vapes. First time using the tres leche and i must say this is an amazing vape. Thanks for sharing!
